phrases.en: I want to go to Korea
What do you do on weekends?

sentences.en: I drink coffee at the cafe
I want to go to Korea
It's raining so I'm at home
I will watch a movie tomorrow
I watch movies with friends on weekends
I'm tired so I rest at home
I bought water at the convenience store
I will meet a friend tomorrow
I read books at the library
I eat and then drink coffee
I work at the company today
I buy fruit at the mart
If the weather is cold, I stay home
I will cook in the evening
I'm thirsty so I drink water
What will you do on the weekend?
If you have time, let's go together
